name: Apple, Dried Cherry, and Walnut Salad Maple Dressing
description: Dressing can be prepared up to 3 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Re-whisk before using.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk mayonnaise, maple syrup, vinegar, and sugar in medium bowl to blend.
Gradually whisk in oil until mixture thickens slightly. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
